content: this legal text provides a summary of the progress of a specific case referred to as case n° 2812023 the case begins with one party filing a complaint against another party alleging actions or events that have caused harm or dispute the court reviews the allegations and determines if there is enough evidence to proceed if there is the defendant is notified and given time to respond to the allegations the court evaluates the arguments and evidence from both parties and may request additional information or schedule hearings once all necessary information is gathered the court makes a final decision which can be in favor of one party or a compromise the decision is communicated to both parties and further steps or actions may be required in this specific case the court has made a final decision regarding the dissolution of a community inheritance assigning different lots to the heirs involved the court has applied certain articles from the civil code and civil procedure code and involved a notary the courts judgment has been issued in a civil case registered as 9162013 gr involving specific parties represented by their attorney the court has accepted the plaintiffs request and declared the inheritance to be attributed to the deceased the court has assigned lots to the heirs and ordered compensation payments and the transcription of the judgment in the real estate records the costs of the lawsuit will be divided between the parties
